Market_Research_Participation.Question: Have you ever participated in a market research group or discussion in the past 6 months?

Cigarettes_Per_Day.Question: How many cigarettes do you smoke in an average day?
Options: Fewer than ten cigarettes/less than one-half pack per day
Ten or more cigarettes/one-half pack per day or more
Cigarettes_Per_Day.Answer: Ten or more cigarettes/one-half pack per day or more
